project.title: Neural Network Pipeline for Petrophysical Analysis
project.subtitle: Advanced Machine Learning pipeline for petrophysical analysis and prediction from well logs, with optimized neural networks and rigorous validation.
project.description: State-of-the-art comprehensive solution to automate petrophysical analysis through artificial intelligence and advanced machine learning techniques. This project implements a robust 8-step pipeline from raw LAS files to production-ready deployment models, incorporating GPU acceleration with RAPIDS, Bayesian optimization with Optuna, and rigorous cross-validation. The system includes MLOps capabilities for continuous monitoring and automatic model retraining.

pipeline_steps.title: Data Collection & Preprocessing
pipeline_steps.description: Comprehensive data acquisition from LAS files with quality control, outlier detection and data cleaning procedures

pipeline_steps.title: Feature Engineering
pipeline_steps.description: Generation of advanced petrophysical features from raw well logs

pipeline_steps.title: Data Normalization
pipeline_steps.description: Per-well and global normalization strategies to optimize training performance

pipeline_steps.title: Hyperparameter Optimization
pipeline_steps.description: Bayesian search with Optuna for optimal architectures and parameters

pipeline_steps.title: Cross Validation
pipeline_steps.description: Rigorous K-fold validation with composite metrics and stability evaluation

pipeline_steps.title: Final Training
pipeline_steps.description: Production training with best hyperparameters and complete dataset

pipeline_steps.title: Model Evaluation
pipeline_steps.description: Comprehensive evaluation with multiple metrics and per-well visualizations

pipeline_steps.title: Model Deployment
pipeline_steps.description: Complete model packaging with scalers and transformers for production use

key_features.title: LAS Processing
key_features.description: Automated LAS file processing with anomaly detection and intelligent data cleaning capabilities.

key_features.title: Feature Engineering
key_features.description: Advanced petrophysical feature engineering with domain-specific transformations and predictive modeling.

key_features.title: Automatic Optimization
key_features.description: Bayesian hyperparameter optimization with intelligent search and multi-objective evaluation strategies.

key_features.title: Robust Validation
key_features.description: Rigorous K-fold cross-validation with composite metrics and model stability evaluation framework.

documentation.title: 02_Feature Engineering
